section.section: Each carrier shall elect to become either a risk-assuming carrier or reinsuring carrier.

The notification of election to become a risk-assuming carrier shall include an appropriate opinion by an independent qualified actuary that the risk-assuming carrier is able to assume and manage the risk of enrolling groups under this subtitle without the protection of the Pool.
The initial election under this section is binding for 3 years.
After the initial 3 years, and every 5 years thereafter, each carrier shall again elect to be either a risk-assuming or reinsuring carrier.
Each subsequent election is binding for 5 years.
The Commissioner may allow a new carrier to make an election under conditions established by the Commissioner.
The Commissioner may allow a carrier to change its election at any time for good cause shown.
While the Commissioner is considering an application under this subsection, the carrier may request a hearing as provided under Title 11, Subtitle 5 of this article.
